text: Montalembert can refer to: * André de Montalembert (1483–1553), French officer * Marc René, marquis de Montalembert (1714–1800), French military engineer and writer * Charles Forbes René de Montalembert (1810–1870), French publicist and historian * Montalembert, Deux-Sèvres, a commune in the Deux-Sèvres department in France
title: Montalembert
